name: SophisticatedApeRoboticPoetryReading
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Alexa reads dispassionately a randomly selected poem from the archives of SophisticatedApe.com. Sophisticated Ape highlights poems and art from the public domain. Curated by humans, read by robots. To read more poetry, see more art or hear independent music, visit sophisticatedape.com.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
